text: Sonia Gandhi (b. December 9, 1946 is an Indian politician. She was the president of the Indian National Congress. She is the widow of the former Prime Minister of India, Rajiv Gandhi. She is the chairperson of the national advisory council. In 1998, she was elected president of the Indian National Congress. Sonia was born Antoio maino in Ovassanjo, Italy. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1946 births Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Presidents of the Indian National Congress Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Sonia Gandhi
